name: The Great Fleece (Roasted_Tatos)
description:
==========================================  The Great Fleece =====================================
Sneaking into the most lavishes of any Auction Houses, The Beatrice Grand Auction House. Darren with only his guts and a voice over a mic, will need to muster all that he has to sneak past the heavy guarded area and get his reward!  
=============================================================================================

This is a project in trying to understand and work with Cinemachine and directing with cameras and camera angles.  With the point & Click mechanic, direct Darren our main player to the back of the Auction House where the main vault is located. 

This is a project for GameDevHQ.
